price: Ibiri mu birere n’ibiri mu isi byose ni ibye. Ni na We ukwiye gusengwa by’ukuri. Ese mugandukira undi utari Allah?
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلدِّينُ وَاصِبًاۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walahu al-dīnu wāṣiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaqūna
